mapper.select:
SELECT goods_id ,title ,label_promotion ,category ,pic_info ,market_price ,discount_price ,sale_qty ,stock_qty ,valid_thru ,online_date ,taobao_price ,taobao_link ,taobao_sales ,data_source FROM ps_goods WHERE status = 'on_shelf' AND discount_price <= 9.9 AND label_promotion <> 'freshman' AND (flags IS NULL OR flags ='0')
AND label_promotion like CONCAT('%',#{label_promotion},'%')

SELECT count(t.goods_id) as count_num FROM ps_goods t
1=1 AND t.status <> 'delete'
AND t.supplier_id = #{supplier_id} AND t.status = 'on_shelf'
ORDER BY t.modified_date DESC

SELECT goods_id ,goods_code ,title ,desc1 ,area_id ,online_date ,label ,label_promotion ,category ,data_source ,display_area ,contact_person ,contact_tel ,pic_info ,pic_detail_info ,specification ,agent ,pack ,cost_price ,market_price ,discount_price ,ladder_price ,product_source ,shipping_fee ,settled_price ,service_fee ,producer ,supplier_id ,supplier ,warehouse ,warehouse_id ,manufacturer ,min_buy_qty ,max_buy_qty ,sale_qty ,stock_qty ,goods_unit ,valid_thru ,delivery ,status ,created_date ,modified_date ,remark ,taobao_link ,taobao_sales FROM ps_goods
status <> 'delete'
AND category = #{category}
AND DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{created_date_start}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(created_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{created_date_end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY created_date DESC

SELECT goods_id ,title ,pic_info ,market_price ,discount_price ,sale_qty ,valid_thru ,taobao_link ,taobao_sales ,data_source FROM ps_goods
status = 'on_shelf' AND category ='试样'
AND valid_thru > #{valid_thru_start}
ORDER BY valid_thru

SELECT goods_id ,title ,pic_info ,market_price ,discount_price ,sale_qty ,valid_thru ,taobao_link ,taobao_sales ,data_source ,desc1 FROM ps_goods
status = 'on_shelf' AND category ='试样' AND data_source='taobao'
AND valid_thru > #{valid_thru_start}
ORDER BY valid_thru

SELECT goods_id ,title ,pic_info ,market_price ,discount_price ,sale_qty ,valid_thru ,taobao_link ,taobao_sales ,data_source ,desc1 FROM ps_goods
status = 'on_shelf' AND category ='试样'
AND valid_thru > #{valid_thru_start}
ORDER BY valid_thru

SELECT g.goods_id ,g.title ,g.area_id ,g.online_date ,g.label ,g.label_promotion ,g.category ,g.data_source ,g.display_area ,g.pic_info ,g.specification ,g.supplier ,g.pack ,g.min_buy_qty ,g.max_buy_qty ,g.market_price ,g.discount_price ,g.sale_qty ,g.cost_allocation ,g.stock_qty ,g.delivery_area ,g.valid_thru ,g.ts_min_num ,g.ts_price ,g.taobao_link ,g.taobao_sales FROM ps_goods g
g.status = 'on_shelf'
AND g.category = #{category}
AND g.category in
#{item}
AND g.display_area like CONCAT('%',#{display_area},'%')
AND
g.display_area like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
AND
delivery_area = #{item}
AND (g.title like CONCAT('%',#{goods_like},'%') or g.goods_code like CONCAT('%',#{goods_like},'%'))
AND g.label_promotion like CONCAT('%',#{label_promotion},'%')
AND
(CASE ISNULL(g.label_promotion) when 1 THEN '' ELSE g.label_promotion END) NOT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
ORDER BY g.online_date DESC

SELECT goods_id ,title ,pic_info ,label_promotion ,market_price ,discount_price ,sale_qty ,stock_qty ,online_date ,valid_thru ,taobao_price ,taobao_link ,data_source ,taobao_sales FROM ps_goods
status = 'on_shelf' AND category = '试样' AND label_promotion NOT LIKE '%freshman%'
AND label_promotion like CONCAT('%',#{label_promotion},'%')
AND valid_thru < #{valid_thru_end}
ORDER BY online_date DESC

SELECT goods_id ,title ,pic_info ,label_promotion ,market_price ,discount_price ,sale_qty ,stock_qty ,online_date ,valid_thru ,taobao_price ,taobao_link ,data_source ,taobao_sales FROM ps_goods
status = 'on_shelf' AND category = '试样' AND (flags IS NULL OR flags ='0') AND data_source='meitianhui' AND label_promotion NOT LIKE '%freshman%'
AND label_promotion like CONCAT('%',#{label_promotion},'%')
AND valid_thru < #{valid_thru_end}
ORDER BY online_date DESC

SELECT goods_id ,title ,pic_info ,label_promotion ,market_price ,discount_price ,sale_qty ,stock_qty ,online_date ,valid_thru ,taobao_price ,taobao_link ,data_source ,taobao_sales FROM ps_goods
status = 'on_shelf' AND category = '试样' AND data_source='huiguo' AND label_promotion NOT LIKE '%freshman%'
AND label_promotion like CONCAT('%',#{label_promotion},'%')
AND valid_thru < #{valid_thru_end}
ORDER BY online_date DESC

SELECT goods_id ,title ,pic_info ,label_promotion ,market_price ,discount_price ,sale_qty ,stock_qty ,online_date ,valid_thru ,taobao_price ,taobao_link ,data_source ,taobao_sales FROM ps_goods
status = 'on_shelf' AND category = '试样' AND data_source='taobao'
AND label_promotion like CONCAT('%',#{label_promotion},'%')
AND valid_thru < #{valid_thru_end}
ORDER BY online_date DESC

SELECT goods_id ,title ,pic_info ,label_promotion ,market_price ,discount_price ,sale_qty ,stock_qty ,online_date ,valid_thru ,taobao_price ,taobao_link ,data_source ,taobao_sales FROM ps_goods
status = 'on_shelf' AND category = '试样' AND (data_source='taobao' OR data_source='hsrj' OR data_source='merchants')
AND label_promotion like CONCAT('%',#{label_promotion},'%')
AND valid_thru < #{valid_thru_end}
ORDER BY online_date DESC

SELECT goods_id ,title ,pic_info ,label_promotion ,market_price ,discount_price ,sale_qty ,stock_qty ,online_date ,valid_thru ,taobao_price ,taobao_link ,data_source ,taobao_sales FROM ps_goods
status = 'on_shelf' AND category = '试样'
AND label_promotion like CONCAT('%',#{label_promotion},'%')
AND valid_thru < #{valid_thru_end}
AND HOUR(valid_thru) IN
#{item}
ORDER BY online_date DESC

SELECT goods_id ,title ,pic_info ,label_promotion ,market_price ,discount_price ,sale_qty ,stock_qty ,online_date ,valid_thru ,taobao_price ,taobao_link ,taobao_sales ,data_source FROM ps_goods
status = 'on_shelf' AND category = '试样'
AND label_promotion like CONCAT('%',#{label_promotion},'%')
AND title like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND valid_thru < #{valid_thru_end}
ORDER BY online_date DESC

SELECT goods_id ,title ,pic_info ,label_promotion ,market_price ,discount_price ,sale_qty ,stock_qty ,online_date ,valid_thru ,taobao_price ,taobao_link ,taobao_sales ,data_source FROM ps_goods
status = 'on_shelf' AND category = '试样'
AND label_promotion like CONCAT('%',#{label_promotion},'%')
AND title like CONCAT('%',#{search},'%')
AND valid_thru < #{valid_thru_end}
ORDER BY online_date DESC

SELECT g.goods_id ,g.goods_code ,g.title ,a.pic_info FROM ps_goods_activity a inner join ps_goods g on a.goods_id = g.goods_id
1=1
AND a.activity_type = #{activity_type}
ORDER BY a.order_no

SELECT g.goods_id ,g.goods_code ,g.label_promotion ,g.title ,g.pic_info ,g.data_source ,g.specification ,g.market_price ,g.discount_price ,g.ts_price ,g.supplier ,g.sale_qty ,g.stock_qty ,g.min_buy_qty ,g.valid_thru FROM ps_goods_activity a inner join ps_goods g on a.goods_id = g.goods_id
g.status = 'on_shelf'
AND a.activity_type = #{activity_type}
ORDER BY a.order_no

SELECT g.goods_id ,g.title ,g.desc1 ,a.pic_info ,g.market_price ,g.discount_price ,g.ts_price ,g.ts_min_num ,g.valid_thru ,g.data_source ,g.taobao_sales ,g.taobao_price FROM ps_goods_activity a inner join ps_goods g on a.goods_id = g.goods_id
g.status = 'on_shelf'
AND a.activity_type = #{activity_type}
ORDER BY a.order_no

SELECT g.goods_id ,g.title ,g.desc1 ,a.pic_info ,g.market_price ,g.discount_price ,g.ts_price ,g.ts_min_num ,g.valid_thru ,g.data_source FROM ps_goods_activity a inner join ps_goods g on a.goods_id = g.goods_id
g.status = 'on_shelf'
AND a.activity_type = #{activity_type}
ORDER BY a.order_no

SELECT g.goods_id ,g.goods_code ,g.title ,g.desc1 ,g.label ,g.label_promotion ,g.category ,g.contact_person ,g.contact_tel ,g.pic_info ,g.specification ,g.cost_price ,g.market_price ,g.discount_price ,g.product_source ,g.shipping_fee ,g.supplier ,g.manufacturer ,g.min_buy_qty ,g.max_buy_qty ,g.product_source ,g.sale_qty ,g.stock_qty ,g.valid_thru ,g.payment_way ,g.status ,s.view ,s.sell FROM ps_goods g left join gd_view_sell_stat s on g.goods_id=s.goods_id
1=1
AND g.goods_id = #{goods_id}
AND (g.title like CONCAT('%',#{goods_like},'%') or g.goods_code like CONCAT('%',#{goods_like},'%') or g.category like CONCAT('%',#{category},'%') or g.contact_person like CONCAT('%',#{goods_like},'%') or g.contact_tel like CONCAT('%',#{goods_like},'%') or g.supplier like CONCAT('%',#{goods_like},'%'))
ORDER BY s.sell DESC,s.view DESC

SELECT g.goods_id ,g.goods_code ,g.title ,g.desc1 ,g.label ,g.label_promotion ,g.category ,g.contact_person ,g.contact_tel ,g.pic_info ,g.specification ,g.cost_price ,g.market_price ,g.discount_price ,g.product_source ,g.shipping_fee ,g.supplier ,g.manufacturer ,g.min_buy_qty ,g.max_buy_qty ,g.product_source ,g.sale_qty ,g.stock_qty ,g.valid_thru ,g.payment_way ,g.status ,s.view ,s.sell FROM gd_view_sell_stat s left join ps_goods g on g.goods_id=s.goods_id
1=1
AND g.goods_id = #{goods_id}
AND (g.title like CONCAT('%',#{goods_like},'%') or g.goods_code like CONCAT('%',#{goods_like},'%') or g.category like CONCAT('%',#{category},'%') or g.contact_person like CONCAT('%',#{goods_like},'%') or g.contact_tel like CONCAT('%',#{goods_like},'%') or g.supplier like CONCAT('%',#{goods_like},'%'))
ORDER BY s.sell DESC

UPDATE gd_goods_item SET
modified_date = SYSDATE(),
title = #{title},
desc1 = #{desc1},
online_date = #{online_date},
offline_date = #{offline_date},
label = #{label},
label_promotion = #{label_promotion},
category = #{category},
contact_person = #{contact_person},
contact_tel = #{contact_tel},
pic_info = #{pic_info},
pic_detail_info = #{pic_detail_info},
specification = #{specification},
pack = #{pack},
cost_price = #{cost_price},
market_price = #{market_price},
discount_price = #{discount_price},
ladder_price = #{ladder_price},
ts_min_num = #{ts_min_num},
ts_price = #{ts_price },
ts_date = #{ts_date},
cost_allocation = #{cost_allocation},
product_source = #{product_source},
shipping_fee = #{shipping_fee},
settled_price = #{settled_price},
service_fee = #{service_fee},
producer = #{producer},
agent = #{agent},
supplier_id = #{supplier_id},
supplier = #{supplier},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer},
sale_qty = #{sale_qty},
stock_qty = #{stock_qty},
goods_unit = #{goods_unit},
valid_thru = #{valid_thru},
payment_way = #{payment_way},
status = #{status},
remark = #{remark},
parity_price = #{parity_price},
parity_platform = #{parity_platform},
parity_url = #{parity_url},
commission_fee = #{commission_fee},
vip_fee = #{vip_fee},
total_sales = #{total_sales},
goods_id=#{goods_id}
AND modified_date=#{modified_date}

modified_date = SYSDATE(),

offline_date = #{offline_date},

stock_qty = #{stock_qty},
sale_qty = #{sale_qty},
ts_min_num = #{ts_min_num},
ts_price = #{ts_price },

commission_rate = #{commission_rate},

huiguo_commission = #{huiguo_commission},
huiguo_vip = #{huiguo_vip},
self_label = #{self_label},
commission = #{commission},
top_catid = #{top_catid},
two_catid = #{two_catid},
three_catid = #{three_catid},
flags = #{flags},
goods_id=#{goods_id}
AND modified_date=#{modified_date}

UPDATE gd_view_sell_stat SET
view = view+1 ,
sell = sell + #{sell_qty},
WHERE goods_id = #{goods_id}

UPDATE ps_goods_stock SET
modified_date = SYSDATE(),
sku = #{sku},
desc1 = #{desc1},
cost_price = #{cost_price},
sales_price = #{sales_price},
stock_qty = stock_qty + #{stock_qty_modify},
sale_qty = sale_qty + #{sale_qty_modify},
status = #{status},
goods_stock_id=#{goods_stock_id}
AND modified_date=#{modified_date}
UPDATE ps_goods SET status = 'delete' where status !='on_shelf' and goods_id=#{goods_id}
UPDATE ps_goods SET taobao_sales = taobao_sales +'1' where status ='on_shelf' and goods_id=#{goods_id}

AND label_promotion like CONCAT('%',#{label_promotion},'%')

modified_date = SYSDATE(),
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desc1 = #{desc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
top_catid = #{top_catid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
two_catid = #{two_catid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

pic_detail_info = #{pic_detail_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

pack = #{pack,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

sale_price = #{sale_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

vip_price = #{vip_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shipping_fee = #{shipping_fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
settled_price = #{settled_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
service_fee = #{service_fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
producer = #{producer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_id = #{supplier_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
min_buy_qty = #{min_buy_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_buy_qty = #{max_buy_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sale_qty = #{sale_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock_qty = #{stock_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_unit = #{goods_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid_thru = #{valid_thru,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
warehouse = #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_id = #{warehouse_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery = #{delivery,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery_id = #{delivery_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery_area = #{delivery_area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

online_date = #{online_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
offline_date = #{offline_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
goods_code = #{goods_code,jdbcType=BIGINT} or goods_id = #{goods_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND modified_date=#{modified_date}

SELECT desc1 FROM beike_mall_goods WHERE goods_id = #{goods_id}
SELECT count(1) FROM ps_goods_activity WHERE is_finished = #{status} AND activity_type IN ("HDMS_04","HDMS_06","HDMS_01")

mapper.update: UPDATE ps_goods_activity SET is_finished = #{status} WHERE goods_id = #{goodsId}
UPDATE beike_mall_goods SET sale_qty = sale_qty-#{sell_qty} WHERE goods_id=#{goods_id} AND (sale_qty-#{sell_qty}) >= 0

update beike_mall_goods
modified_date = SYSDATE(),
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
desc1 = #{desc1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
top_catid = #{top_catid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
two_catid = #{two_catid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
three_catid = #{three_catid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
label = #{label,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
label_promotion = #{label_promotion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_source = #{goods_source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
display_area = #{display_area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_person = #{contact_person,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_tel = #{contact_tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_info = #{pic_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_detail_info = #{pic_detail_info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
specification = #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pack = #{pack,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
market_price = #{market_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sale_price = #{sale_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
beike_credit = #{beike_credit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vip_price = #{vip_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shipping_fee = #{shipping_fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
settled_price = #{settled_price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
producer = #{producer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_id = #{supplier_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier = #{supplier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manufacturer = #{manufacturer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
min_buy_qty = #{min_buy_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
max_buy_qty = #{max_buy_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sale_qty = #{sale_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stock_qty = #{stock_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_unit = #{goods_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid_thru = #{valid_thru,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
warehouse = #{warehouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
warehouse_id = #{warehouse_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery = #{delivery,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery_id = #{delivery_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delivery_area = #{delivery_area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

WHERE goods_code = #{goods_code,jdbcType=BIGINT} or goods_id = #{goods_id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select T.goods_id ,T.goods_code ,T.title ,T.desc1 ,T.top_catid ,T.two_catid ,T.three_catid ,T.label ,T.label_promotion ,T.goods_source ,T.display_area ,T.contact_person ,T.contact_tel ,T.pic_info ,T.pic_detail_info ,T.specification ,T.pack ,T.market_price ,T.sale_price ,T.beike_credit ,T.vip_price ,T.shipping_fee ,T.settled_price ,T.producer ,T.supplier_id ,T.supplier ,T.manufacturer ,T.min_buy_qty ,T.max_buy_qty ,T.sale_qty ,T.stock_qty ,T.goods_unit ,T.valid_thru ,T.warehouse ,T.warehouse_id ,T.delivery ,T.delivery_id ,T.delivery_area ,T.payment_way ,T.status ,T.created_date ,T.modified_date ,T.remark ,T.online_date ,T.offline_date FROM beike_mall_goods T
WHERE goods_code = #{goods_code}
